clipResource.desc: The audio clip to load upon activation

autoplay.desc: Set to true if the emitter should start immediately upon creation

pan.desc: 2D pan for non spatialized sounds. (L = -1.0, R = 1.0)

loop.desc: Set to true if the emitter should loop after reaching the end of the clip

clock.desc: Set this to > 0 if you need to delay the start of sounds so that rapidly launched sounds don't all get clumped to the start of the next outgoing sound buffer.

minDistance.desc: Minimum audible distance of the sound

maxDistance.desc: Maximum audible distance of the sound
